subject: Gittip: [Good] Shares data with listed third party vendors
text:
Title: [Good] Shares data with listed third party vendors
Topic: third
Summary: Gittip lists the services it uses on the backend (currently Balanced Payments, Google Analytics, and Heroku).
Score: 100

> We also share your personal information with these third party vendors who work on our behalf:

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
